data.description:
Crumbling is a nostalgic adventure that thrusts you into a world where you smash your action-figure character against legions of toy monsters!

# Action Figures in VR
Unwrap your Crumbling from the blister package and take their fate into your hands – literally! Crumbling is a **rogue-like** adventure where you control your character with one hand, just like an **action figure**.

{439321325387176}

# Pick Your Crumbling
Select one of three unique heroes with vastly different gameplay. Will your **Knight** hack and slash the enemies to pieces, or will you wield the **Shaman** with its mystical powers? Or maybe just cover the diorama in plastic bullets with the **Blaster**.

{6801499586619218}

# Fast-Paced Fighting
Move your palm-sized hero through gorgeously crafted toy dioramas and clash with an army of plastic monsters in thrilling **hack'n'slash combat**. It’s a test of **skill and timing** as you evade, counter, and smash your way through to the next boss!

{318053584492843}

# Romping Story Comics
Crack open the **narrated comic book** and discover the story of Mr. and Mrs. Crumble, creators of the magical ‘Crumbling’ action figures. Can this sweet couple and their plucky creations triumph against the nefarious toymaking corporation Böse Corp?

{3567892993460052}

# Features 

★ Unique “handheld” VR combat!

★ Action-figure nostalgia in VR and MR!

★ Roguelike hack'n'slash action!

★ Different heroes and collectibles!

★ Tons of monsters, fun mini games, and epic end bosses!

★ A romping story inspired by saturday morning cartoons!

★ Yelling “Whoosh! Bam! Pow!” as you play is optional but highly recommended!
